title: Textile, "Rhythm", 1972
medium: Technique: screen printed using three color screens
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 251 x 139 cm (8 ft. 2 13/16 in. x 54 3/4 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 258 x 137 cm (8 ft. 5 9/16 in. x 53 15/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Henry C. and Eleanor Kluck
description: Waving diagonal lines in two browns and blue on a white ground. The patterns on A and B are different though related and have been planned so the pattern continues from side to side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Rhythm", 1972.
1972. Technique: screen printed using three color screens. Gift of Henry C. and Eleanor Kluck. 1985-84-14-a,b.
